bug.author: narendasan
bug.summary: Module tests fail because of segfault in cuDNN destructor
bug.description: The tests pass functionality wise, but in the clean up, the test segfaults. It seems like this is a issue others have seen in libtorch <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/issues/17658>pytorch/pytorch#17658</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: Recent issues may be fixed in PyTorch next with this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/36416>pytorch/pytorch#36416</denchmark-link>
This issue has not seen activity for 30 days, Remove stale label or comment or this will be closed in 5 days
